meanings.definition: The dried remains of a fruit or plant
meanings.sent1: I collected some frugs from the apple tree to use in my art project.
meanings.sent2: The gardener swept up the frugs from the garden to keep it tidy.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel mistook the frugs for nuts and tried to bury them.
meanings.sent4: The frugs scattered on the ground looked like confetti celebrating nature's beauty.
meanings.sent5: The frugs crumbled in my hand, releasing a sweet, earthy scent.

meanings.sent1: At the retro party, everyone got up to do the frugs when the music started.
meanings.sent2: The dance instructor taught us the classic moves of the frugs.
meanings.sent3: Grandma surprised us all by showing off her frugs skills from her youth.
meanings.sent4: The frugs dance brought back memories of a bygone era filled with joy and rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The frugs had a simple charm that made everyone want to join in.

meanings.sent1: The children frugs around the living room, giggling and twirling.

meanings.sent3: The dog seemed to frugs along with the music, wagging its tail in delight.
